sourcesContent:
import app from './app'

app.listen(app.get('port'))

console.log('server port', app.get('port'))

import express from 'express'
import config from './config'
import citesRoutes from "./routes/cites.routes";

const app = express()

app.use(citesRoutes)

app.set('port', config.port)
export default app

export * from './conection';
export { queries } from './querys';

export const queries = {
    getAllCities: 'SELECT * FROM cites',
    addNewCite: 'INSERT INTO cites (name, status, user_id) VALUES (@name, @status, @user_id)',
    getCitesById: 'SELECT * FROM cites WHERE id = @id',
    deleteCitesById: 'DELETE FROM [mpdb].[dbo].[cites] WHERE id = @id',
    updateCitesById: 'UPDATE cites SET name = @name, status = @status WHERE id = @id'
}

export * from './conection';
export { queries } from './querys';

export const queries = {
    getAllCities: 'SELECT * FROM cites',
    addNewCite: 'INSERT INTO cites (name, status, user_id) VALUES (@name, @status, @user_id)',
    getCitesById: 'SELECT * FROM cites WHERE id = @id',
    deleteCitesById: 'DELETE FROM [mpdb].[dbo].[cites] WHERE id = @id',
    updateCitesById: 'UPDATE cites SET name = @name, status = @status WHERE id = @id'
}

import app from './app'

app.listen(app.get('port'))

console.log('server port', app.get('port'))

import {config} from 'dotenv'
config()

export default{
    port: process.env.port || 3000,
    userDb: process.env.user_Db || "",
    passwordDb: process.env.password_Db || "",
    serverDb: process.env.server_Db || "",
    databaseDb: process.env.database_Db || ""
}

export * from './conection';
export { queries } from './querys';

export const queries = {
    getAllCities: 'SELECT * FROM cites',
    addNewCite: 'INSERT INTO cites (name, status, user_id) VALUES (@name, @status, @user_id)',
    getCitesById: 'SELECT * FROM cites WHERE id = @id',
    deleteCitesById: 'DELETE FROM [mpdb].[dbo].[cites] WHERE id = @id',
    updateCitesById: 'UPDATE cites SET name = @name, status = @status WHERE id = @id'
}

export * from './conection';
export { queries } from './querys';

import app from './app'

app.listen(app.get('port'))

console.log('server port', app.get('port'))

export * from './conection';
export { queries } from './querys';

export const queries = {
    getAllCities: 'SELECT c.ID, c.name, i.cel, i.city, i.address  FROM cites_infos i JOIN cites c ON i.cites_id = c.ID',
    addNewCite: 'INSERT INTO cites (name, status, user_id) VALUES (@name, @status, @user_id)',
    addNewInfo: 'INSERT INTO cites_infos (cel, city, address, status, cites_id) VALUES (@cel, @city, @address, @status, @cite_id)',
    getCitesById: 'SELECT * FROM cites WHERE id = @id',
    deleteCitesById: 'DELETE FROM [mpdb].[dbo].[cites] WHERE id = @id',
    updateCitesById: 'UPDATE cites SET name = @name, status = @status WHERE id = @id',
    updateCiteInfoById: 'UPDATE cites_infos SET cel = @cel, address = @address, city = @city WHERE cites_id = @id ;'
}

export * from './conection';
export { queries } from './querys';

export const queries = {
    getAllCities: 'SELECT c.ID, c.name, i.cel, i.city, i.address  FROM cites_infos i JOIN cites c ON i.cites_id = c.ID',
    addNewCite: 'INSERT INTO cites (name, status, user_id) VALUES (@name, @status, @user_id)',
    addNewInfo: 'INSERT INTO cites_infos (cel, city, address, status, cites_id) VALUES (@cel, @city, @address, @status, @cite_id)',
    getCitesById: 'SELECT * FROM cites WHERE id = @id',
    deleteCitesById: 'DELETE FROM [mpdb].[dbo].[cites] WHERE id = @id',
    updateCitesById: 'UPDATE cites SET name = @name, status = @status WHERE id = @id',
    updateCiteInfoById: 'UPDATE cites_infos SET cel = @cel, address = @address, city = @city WHERE cites_id = @id ;'
}
